page.title: 10LIFE STYLES
page.content: {A DAY IN MY LIFE BY DAVID HOWAT AGE 8 I WAKE UP AT 8.00 AM AND HAVE MY BREAKFAST. I GET MY BAG READY AND PUT ON MY SHOES. IT IS 8.45 AM SO I GO TO SCHOOL. IT TAKES ME 3 MINUTES TO WALK UP TO SCHOOL. I PUT MY BAG IN THE PORCH AND GO BACK OUT. I PLAY WITH PETER TILL MR ELSE TELLS US TO COME INSIDE,IT IS SOON BREAK TIME SO I PLAY TIGS WITH PETER,BRIAN AND SEAN. WE DO SOME MORE WORK.IT IS SOON LUNCH TIME. I EAT MY LUNCH THEN WE PLAY FOOTBALL. WE HAVE TO GO IN AND DO SOME MORE WORK. THEN WE GO OUT AGAIN AND I PLAY TIGS WITH PETER,BRIAN AND SEAN. THEN MR ELSE READS US A STORY. AFTER THAT WE GO FOR OUR BAGS WE STACK OUR CHAIRS AND GO HOME.I SOMETIMES GO SWIMMING THEN HAVE MY TEA AND PLAY ON THE COMPUTER.I CALL FOR PAUL AND WE FLY OUR KITE .IT IS 9.30PM AND I GO HOME,MY SUPPER AND GO TO BED.
